channel.title: Split private chat,coloured yell and hp bars.WILL.REP
channel.description: Hey guys,im using delta 317 and i wanna know how to get split private chat,colourfull yell and how to change the hp bars.I HAVE looked around,but i cant find many.I have done @yel@ on my yell but it just shows on game as @yel@ instead of being yellow.Please help,i will rep you if you help :D thanks.
